title: Name that font:
content:
[http://www.amazon.com/Design-Activism-Beautiful-Strangeness-Sustainable/dp/1844076458/ref=sr\_1\_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1252766128&sr=8-1](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020829/http:/www.amazon.com/Design-Activism-Beautiful-Strangeness-Sustainable/dp/1844076458/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1252766128&sr=8-1)

I’ve been looking for this throughout all my resources, can’t seem to find it. Anybody have an idea?
author: jasonwharff

comments.content: Indeed it is, good call and thank you very much. Kontrapunkt is actually free to download now [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020829/http:/www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize_typeface_of_the_year_2004#downloads)
